WEBGL_depth_texture.summary: The WEBGL_depth_texture extension is part of the WebGL API and defines 2D depth and depth-stencil textures.

remarks.para: WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para: This extension is only available to {{domxref("WebGLRenderingContext", "WebGL1", "", 1)}} contexts. In {{domxref("WebGL2RenderingContext", "WebGL2", "", 1)}}, the functionality of this extension is available on the WebGL2 context by default. The constant in WebGL2 is gl.UNSIGNED_INT_24_8.
